overview: Fireman Tom Byron and his delectable fiance Sharon Kane are only one day away from being married. Tom's firehouse buddies decide to throw him the ultimate bachelor bash, bringing along a trio of sultry sirens who are sure to start a five-alarm blaze! When Keisha, FiFi Bardot and Ebony Ayes show up at the station, it's a fiery free-for-all that leaves them all well-spent. Meanwhile, Sharon's working on the side at a local bordello, making ends meet by letting a few good men meet her end. When an overheated dildo starts a raging inferno, it seems that Sharon's game may be up! It's up to Fire Chief Jon Martin to put things right -- including madam Nina Hartley's lusty libido! Fast-paced, red-hot fun!
title: Red Hot Fire Girls
